Title: An Average Little Man
Writer: Vincenzo Cerami (novel), Sergio Amidei (screenplay), Mario Monicelli (screenplay)
Actors: Alberto Sordi, Shelley Winters, Vincenzo Crocitti, Romolo Valli
Plot: Giovanni Vivaldi is an average middle-aged man with a secure job as a government accountant. He wishes nothing more than to set up his only son Mario, his biggest pride in the world, with the same secure government job before he eventually retires. For this, Giovanni will stop at nothing...
